item.title: US government considers historic break-up of Google in antitrust case
item.description:
The U.S. Justice Department is considering asking a federal judge to force Google to sell off parts of its business, potentially leading to the first major corporate breakup in four decades and reshaping one of the world’s most valuable tech companies. The Department of Justice and a coalition of state attorneys general on Tuesday unveiled […]

item.title: Sony has started selling refurbished PS5 consoles - Video Games Chronicle
item.description:
1. Sony has started selling refurbished PS5 consoles  Video Games Chronicle
  2. Refurbished PS5s are officially available through Sony, starting at $350  Polygon
  3. Sony begins selling refurbished PS5s, but Amazon's deal on the PS5 Slim (Disc version) is the sensible purchase  Notebookcheck.net
  4. Should you purchase a used PS5?  Inquirer.net
  5. You can now buy a refurbished PS5 console from Sony for $350  BGR

item.title: The best soundbar deals on October Prime Day — take up to $600 off
item.description: Amazon's Octoebr Prime Day is here. Shop the best soundbar deals from LG, Roku, Amazon, and more, and take up to $600 off.

item.title: Amazon has dropped prices on a bunch of Bluetooth speakers for October Prime Day
item.description: Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days is coming Oct. 8 and 9. Shop early deals on Bluetooth speakers from JBL, Sony, and Ultimate Ears.

item.title: Prime Day deals keep rolling in — shop wireless earbuds now
item.description: We're tracking the deals on wireless earbuds ahead of Prime Big Deal Days. Shop sales on AirPods — even the new AirPods 4.

item.title: With October Prime Day still going, shop these deals on noise-cancelling headphones
item.description: With Amazon's October Prime Days here, start shopping deals on noise-cancelling headphones from Beats, Apple, Sennheiser, JBL, and more.

item.title: The best October Prime Day headphones and speakers deals from Sony, Bose, and more
item.description: Amazon's October Prime Big Deal Days is here. Start shopping deals now on headphones and speakers from Apple, Sony, Ultimate Ears, and more.

item.title: The best October Prime Day TV deals are on Fire TVs
item.description: Prime Day is a great time to buy a TV. The day before October Prime Day, several Fire TVs and affordable QLEDs are on sale. Shop models from Amazon, Samsung, Toshiba, LG, Sony, and more.

item.title: Amazon Fire tablets are up to 56% off this October Prime Day
item.description: On Amazon's October Prime Day, Fire tablets are already up to 56% off, including the Fire HD 8 tablet and the Fire HD 10.

item.title: The best October Prime Day Kindle deals live right now
item.description: Save on a new Kindle bundle with Prime Big Deal Days deals. Plus, shop deals on some of our favorite Kindle books.

item.title: Amazon has some pretty good deals on 2-in-1 laptops on October Prime Day
item.description: We're keeping track of the best 2-in-1 laptop deals on Amazon on Prime Big Deal Days, its "October Prime Day" sale. So far, there's just one worth grabbing.

item.title: Amazon has dropped a new Fire HD 8 tablet — and it's already on sale for October Prime Day
item.description: Amazon's best October Prime Day tablet deals include a steep discount on the updated Fire HD 8 and a new all-time low for Apple's M4 iPad Pro.

item.title: All the best keyboard deals live on October Prime Day
item.description: Prime Big Deal Days starts on Oct. 8. Amazon has keyboard deals from Keychron, Royal Kludge, Epomaker, Logitech, and more. Check out 15 of our top picks.

item.title: The best Chromebook deals available on October Prime Day
item.description: The best Chromebook deals available on October Prime Day aren't on Amazon — but that could change soon.

item.title: The best Apple MacBook deals we could find on October Prime Day
item.description: The best Apple MacBook deals on Prime Big Deal Days include record-low pricing on the M3 MacBook Pro and the M2 MacBook Air.
